# byLayer

**Instance Property**

An effect that makes each layer disappear separately.

## Declaration

```swift
var byLayer: DisappearSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Determining effect scope

- **wholeSymbol**: An effect that makes all layers disappear simultaneously.
